about.details:
Incorporated in 2022, Labelkraft Technologies Limited is engaged in the business of providing barcode code solutions. The company offer services to many different segments of industries like FMCG, logistics service providers, chemicals, garments, etc.

Prior to the incorporation, the operations were run by the Promoter, Ranjeet Solanki via a proprietorship concern under the name of "Solanki Enterprises" since 1997.

The company has been established to fulfill the mission of offering reasonably priced barcode labels, printing, and solutions, keeping customer satisfaction at the foremost.

Labelkraft is committed to offering quality products, giving meticulous attention at each level, and providing ease in services. The company has established itself as a solution provider catering to the customers' needs related to printing barcode ribbons, barcode labels, product labels, barcode printers, scanners, ID card printing products, Patient wrist bands, RFID products, and self-adhesive tape products.

The products of Labelkraft Technologies Limited are applied and used by various industries for their multipurpose use including logistics, industrial packaging, etc.

faqs.question: What is the Labelkraft Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Labelkraft Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 864000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.75 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 13, 2023, and closes on March 15, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Labelkraft Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Labelkraft Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Labelkraft Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Labelkraft Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Labelkraft Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Labelkraft Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Labelkraft Technologies IPO opens on March 13, 2023 and closes on March 15, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Labelkraft Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Labelkraft Technologies IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Labelkraft Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Labelkraft Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Labelkraft Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Labelkraft Technologies IPO will be done on Monday, March 20, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, March 22, 2023. Check the Labelkraft Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Labelkraft Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Labelkraft Technologies IPO listing date is on Thursday, March 23, 2023.
